content: fields of wheat cowl by varant ekmekjian size 7 ½ x 22 around materials  one skein of cascade 220 color shown is straw or any worsted weight yarn  16 circular needles size 7 gauge pattern repeat measures 2 ½ about 5 sts an inch abbreviations k knit p purl t2b slip next stitch on cable needle and hold to the back of work knit next stitch purl stitch from cable needle t2f slip next stitch on cable needle and hold to the front of work purl next stitch knit stitch from cable needle 1 instructions cast on 108 sts join being careful not to twist rounds 1-8 *p4 k3 p4 k1 repeat from * to end of round begin fields of wheat pattern round 1 *p3 t2b k1 t2f p3 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 2 *p3 k1 p1 twice k1 p3 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 3 *p2 t2b p1 k1 p1 t2f p2 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 4 *p2 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 5 *p1 t2b p2 k1 p2 t2f p1 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 6 *p1 k1 p3 k1 twice p1 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 7 *t2b p3 k1 p3 t2f k1 repeat from * to end of round round 8 *p4 k3 p4 k1 repeat from * to end of round repeat pattern 3 more times for a total or 4 repeats do another 7 rounds of ribbing as above and cast off in ribbing block and enjoy some notes the pattern has a 12 st repeat if you want to make your cowl s circumference bigger cast on additional repeats of 12 sts estimate yarn amounts accordingly add height by adding an additional 8 rounds cast on less 12 stitches if you are using thicker yarn thank you all for trying out this pattern please drop me a note if you have any questions concerning this pattern or if you just want to say hi my ravelry screen name is varant fields of wheat cowl © 2012 by varant ekmekjian this pattern is for personal use only not to be reproduced or used commercially 2
